trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, such as <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref>.
This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> to serialize.
Verifies whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid service document.
An XML reader to check.
`true`, if the XML reader contains a valid service document, otherwise `false`.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory"></xref> class.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategories"></xref> instance used to create the new categories document.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ResourceCollectionInfo"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Workspace"></xref> instance used to create the new collection.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ResourceCollectionInfo"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ResourceCollectionInfo"></xref> to use to create the new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref>.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ResourceCollectionInfo"></xref> instance to use to create the new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref>.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Workspace"></xref>
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> to use to create the new workspace.
Returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Workspace"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> associated with the formatter.
Returns the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument"></xref> associated with the formatter.
Loads element extensions.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref> to use to read the element extensions.
The maximum size of an element extension to be loaded.
Loads element extensions.
